# converting(to:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a measurement created by converting the receiver to the specified unit.

## Declaration

```swift
func converting(to unit: Unit) -> Measurement<Unit>
```

## Parameters

- **unit**: The unit to convert the measurement into.

## Return Value

A new measurement with a value calculated by converting into the new unit.

## Discussion

This method raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/invalidArgumentException] if the receiver cannot be converted to unit.

## Converting to Other Units

- **canBeConverted(to:)**: Indicates whether the measurement can be converted to the given unit.
